name: Urur
content:
Urur was a male Tusken Raider who lived on the desert planet of Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. He was the younger brother of the Tusken Raider Ur. Urur was restricted to defending his tribe. If Ur was killed, Urur would take his older brother's place. Urur wore desert-colored robes, with two bandoliers strapped diagonally across both sides of the chest above the belt, along with the standard Tusken mask. He wielded a Gaderffii.
Urur was first mentioned on a card for the Premiere set of Decipher, Inc.'s 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
